meanings.definition: A woman who takes the dominant role in BDSM activities.
meanings.sent1: The dominatrixes at the club wore leather outfits.
meanings.sent2: The dominatrixes in the dungeon were skilled at role-playing.
meanings.sent3: The dominatrixes made sure everyone followed the rules during the game.
meanings.sent4: Her presence in the room was like that of dominatrixes, commanding attention effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The dominatrixes' confidence and assertiveness were unmatched.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of dominatrixes walking down the street.
meanings.sent2: The dominatrixes' outfits were intimidating yet alluring.
meanings.sent3: The dominatrixes gathered for a meeting to discuss their upcoming event.
meanings.sent4: The power dynamic shifted when the dominatrixes entered the room.
meanings.sent5: The dominatrixes' presence was undeniable as they entered the party.
